entry.title: [BHS4/BHS6/BHS7][Infrastructure ] - Electrical background work
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 29, 11:00 - 20:00 UTC

Apr 18, 13:17 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure.

Start time : 29/05/2025 11:00 UTC
End time : 29/05/2025 20:00 UTC
Service impact : Some servers might be temporarily unavailable during 20 minutes.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing an electrical maintenance.
The operation is carried out in several steps:
Step 1 : From 11:00 UTC to 11:30 UTC, this step may temporarily affect Availability of servers
Step 2 : From 11:30 UTC to 19:30 UTC
Step 3 : From 19:30 UTC to 20:00 UTC, this step may temporarily affect Availability of servers

Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS4 are T04A, T04B and T04C
Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS6 are T06B, T06C, T06D, T06E, T06F and T06G
Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS7 are B702, B703, B707 and B709

Our technical teams will be mobilized throughout the maintenance to resolve any impact on your services.

We apologize in advance for any inconvenience caused.

entry.title: [RBX][Network] - Network core equipment maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 19, 20:00 UTC  -  May 20, 05:00 UTC

Apr 25, 15:00 UTC
Scheduled - As part of the continuous improvement of our services, we have planned an evolution of the network infrastructure on the Roubaix site on May 19, 2025.

Start time : 19/05/2025 20:00 UTC
End time : 20/05/2025 05:00 UTC
Service impact : Some network perturbation can be observe during the 3rd step for a duration of 5 to 10 min.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network core infrastructure, we will have to carry out interventions on multiple network equipment.

This maintenance will be structured around three phases, described in detail below :
Step 1 : Preparation of the maintenance operation (about 2 hours)
Step 2 : Deployment of the new infrastructure (about 3 hours)
Step 3 : Testing and activation of the new infrastructure (about3 hours)

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding as we work to improve our services.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [PAR/MAD][Network] - Network incident notification
entry.content:
Apr 29, 09:22 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on network in PAR/MAD has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 28/04/2025 15:08 UTC
End time : 28/04/2025 22:00 UTC
Root Cause : The incident was due to the Regional Power Outage affecting Spain & Portugal

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Apr 29, 02:33 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : As of 22:00 UTC on 28/04/2025, the majority of peers have been restored, and our OVH network is currently stable. However, the situation remains unstable in Spain and Portugal.
Ongoing Actions : Our team are actively monitoring our network.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Apr 28, 22:26 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Our PoP in Madrid is now accessible again as of 21:40 UTC. However, please note that we are still experiencing some peering issues, which may affect connectivity.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Apr 28, 17:33 UTC
Update - Update : Since 28/04/2025 16:40 UTC the Pop in Madrid is unreachable.

Service impact : At 28/04/2025 15:08 UTC lost of the PoP in Madrid. At 28/04/2025 15:38 UTC the Pop was available again.
At 28/04/2025 16:40 UTC lost of the Pop in Madrid.

From 28/04/2025 15:38 UTC, there is multiple peering down at Madrid, leading to re-routing traffic for the following providers :
AIRENET - ESPAIX - TELXIUS - ALTICE

Apr 28, 16:38 UTC
Identified - An incident has occures on our Network in PAR/MAD due to the Regional Power Outage affecting Spain & Portugal, customers in the impacted zone may face some difficulties. Please find the details:
Start time : 28/04/2025 15:08 UTC
End time : 28/04/2025 15:38 UTC
Service impact : At 28/04/2025 15:08 UTC lost of the PoP in Madrid. At 28/04/2025 15:38 UTC the Pop is available again.

From 28/04/2025 15:38 UTC, there is multiple peering down at Madrid, leading to re-routing traffic for the following providers :
AIRENET - ESPAIX - TELXIUS - ALTICE
Root cause : The incident is due to the Regional Power Outage affecting Spain & Portugal
Ongoing actions : The pop in Madrid is available again. We are waiting for final confirmation from our providers. The situation is under control again.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident
